definition: A term used to describe a set of two items or individuals that are considered together due to their close association or connection. It is commonly employed to refer to a couple or a pair of things that are seen as a unit or complement each other.

examples.german: Ich habe ein Paar Schuhe gekauft.
examples.english: I bought a pair of shoes.

examples.german: Kannst du mir ein Paar Stifte leihen?
examples.english: Can you lend me a couple of pens?

examples.german: Meine Eltern haben ein Paar Hunde.
examples.english: My parents have a pair of dogs.

examples.german: Er hat ein Paar Socken verloren.
examples.english: He lost a pair of socks.
